title: Build a Responsive Page Layout
description:
Create a full page layout with header, main content with sidebar, and footer that adapts to screen size.

## Requirements

1. Style the `.page-container`:
   - Maximum width of 1200px
   - Centered with auto margins
   - 16px horizontal padding

2. Style the `.content-wrapper`:
   - Column layout on mobile
   - Row layout at 768px with sidebar on the right
   - 24px gap

3. Style the `.main-content`:
   - Takes remaining space (flex: 1)

4. Style the `.sidebar`:
   - Full width on mobile
   - Fixed 280px width at 768px
   - #f5f5f5 background
   - 16px padding

## Expected Result

Single column on mobile, sidebar appears on right at 768px.

testCases.description: Page container should have max-width of 1200px
Main content should grow (flex: 1 or similar)

hints: Use max-width: 1200px and margin: 0 auto on the container
Use flex-direction: column on mobile for content-wrapper
Use flex: 1 on main-content to fill remaining space
Use flex: 0 0 280px on sidebar at 768px to fix its width
